long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Decoding how someone is feeling is a tough game to crack. Good news is that we did that! This extension offers first-hand experience of what Podlabs LEAP is, how it works, and how it can provide a solid solution to the challenges that other competitors are facing in emotional AI.

This online trial is to showcase you how we capture data post your consent, what your reactions are, and how we display those reactions. You will be offered to view a YouTube video of your choice and we will report your emotional response. Post your viewing the video you will get a link of an interactive dashboard that shows your detailed response.

This online trial is not a trial of every product Podlabs offers but simply a showcase of our technology. Working of this extension expect that you have requested for the trial and have approval to proceed further. If not, please visit – dev.podlabs.ai/take-trial.
